title: Calculate Forest Loss â€” calculate_forest_loss
text: Calculates forest loss within user-defined region specified year range.

title: Calculate Forest Loss â€” calculate_forest_loss
code: calculate_forest_loss(   from,   to,   region,   fun = "mean",   progress = FALSE,   sf = TRUE )

title: Calculate Forest Loss â€” calculate_forest_loss
text: numeric year 2001 2023. Indicates start analysis period. numeric year 2001 2023. Indicates end analysis period. region sf object representing area interest. fun string indicating reducer apply (e.g., "mean", "sum"). Default "mean". progress Logical. Show progress bar? Default FALSE. sf Logical. Return result sf object? Default TRUE.

title: Calculate Forest Loss â€” calculate_forest_loss
text: data.frame sf object forest loss per year square kilometers.

title: Calculate Forest Loss â€” calculate_forest_loss
text: Forest loss derived Hansen Global Forest Change dataset (UMD/hansen/global_forest_change_2023_v1_11). lossyear band encodes year forest cover loss follows: Values range 1 23, corresponding years 2001 2023. value 0 indicates forest loss detected. Forest loss defined stand-replacement disturbance, change forest non-forest state. function uses values calculate annual forest loss within specified region year range.

title: Calculate Forest Loss â€” calculate_forest_loss
text: Hansen, M. C., Potapov, P. V., Moore, R., Hancher, M., Turubanova, S. ., Tyukavina, ., ... & Townshend, J. R. G. (2013). High-Resolution Global Maps 21st-Century Forest Cover Change. Science, 342(6160), 850â€“853. DOI: doi:10.1126/science.1244693
